nodes.text: Tiaba Charr was a female Zabrak who lived on Naboo's moon of Rori during the time of the Galactic Civil War. After the Battle of Yavin, Charr was part of Vladlun's gang, a minor criminal group led by Vladlun Travan. Circa 1 ABY, Dabrini and two other associates of Travan, Aztin Maru and Titus Dabrini, had earned a death mark. The bounty hunter Boba Fett therefore traveled to Rori in order to collect the bounties for the three criminals. However, after tracking them to Vladlun Travan's Hideout, Fett decided to let a spacer who was investigating the bunker do his dirty work and take out the bounty targets. Tiaba Charr was finally killed by the spacer.

Tiaba Charr was a non-player character in the 2003 video game Star Wars Galaxies, a massively multiplayer online role-playing game developed by Sony Online Entertainment and published by LucasArts, prior to its closure on December 15, 2011. Tiaba Charr was added to the game with the release of the "Game Update 12", on August 10, 2009.
